Key Match Events: David Miller hit a match-winning 59 from 46 deliveries
Suryakumar Yadav led India's recovery, scoring 68 off 40
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa moved to the top of Group Two in the Super 12 stage of the T20 World Cup
Lungi Ngidi was the pick of the bowlers with four for 29, while Parnell took three wickets
Others: India elected to bat first but were limited to a well-below par total of 133
